api_list.api_description: Fetches all characters, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of characters to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The name of the show to search for.

query: Can you find characters from the Rick and Morty show and also tell me about the show details?

api_list.api_description: Fetches all episodes, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of episodes to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the schedule for a given country and date.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: An ISO 3166-1 code of the country.

query: Can you provide me a list of all Rick and Morty episodes and the TV schedule for today?

api_list.api_description: Fetches a single location by ID.
Retrieve all primary information for a given show.

required_parameters.name: show_id
required_parameters.description: The TVmaze ID of the show.

query: Can you tell me about the Citadel of Ricks and a show currently airing on TV?
